description:
The final showdown. Kazuma faces off against Yuichi Kirisaki’s son in a legendary battle in Kazuma’s own hometown. However, Kazuma won’t just have to win over Kuroyanagi - Yuichi Kirisaki and Pierrot also step up to the plate as judges!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A qui faire manger du bon pain ? Ja-pan, sois éternel !
Hontou ni Umai Pan o Tabesaseru no wa!? Japan yo, Eien ni!
Who Would You Serve Really Good Bread To!? Long Live Ja-pan!
คนที่จะให้ทานขนมปังอร่อยจริงๆ!? เจปัง Forever
本当に美味いパンを食べさせるのは!? ジャぱんよ, 永遠に!
